alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 11:00PM CDT until June 17 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Eastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1100 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ozark, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Headland, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Malvern, Rehobeth, Avon, Newville, Esto, Madrid, Gordon and Black. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
